sentences.sContent: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.sContent: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.sCn: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

remMethod.val: 源自拉丁文cancelli(斜条格钩)， 据说古罗马书写员在抄写错误时会用斜条格钩状来表明注销， 后引入英语， 作“取消”讲

trans.tranCn: 取消， 废除； 删去， 删除； 抵消
trans.tranOther: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen
